name: Team Up!
description:
Team Up! is a game all about overcoming obstacles with the help of friends! In this simple 2D platformer you will be playing a friendly blob on his way through a mystical world. You will encounter obstacles whcih you will need to overcome by summoning your friends (a giraffe and monkey) which you can each someone one of during the level.  

All levels (besides the tutorial) can be completted without the help of your friends but it's much more quicker, easy and fun when you're not alone!

I'd love to hear your feedback but please keep in mind that this was my first ever game so don't go to harsh on me xD

Sources:

Engine: Construct 3

Button Asset: Sprout Lands - https://cupnooble.itch.io/ 

Background Music: Mushrooms - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/

Sound Effect Jump: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/sfx-jump-07-80241/

Sound effect Death: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/retro-video-game-death-95730/

All other art was drawn by me :)
